price: En la historia de José y sus hermanos hay signos para los que buscan la verdad.
arabic: ۞ لَّقَدۡ كَانَ فِي يُوسُفَ وَإِخۡوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: laqad kāna fī yūsufa wa-ikh'watihi āyātun lilssāilīna
